articles.headline: Stephen Curry scores 28 points, Moses Moody adds 24 as Warriors beat Suns 118-107
articles.description: — Stephen Curry scored 28 points with five 3-pointers, Moses Moody came off the bench to score 24 and also hit five 3s, and the Golden State Warriors jumped to a big early lead before holding on for a 118-107 victory over the short-handed Phoenix Suns...

images.alt: Stephen Curry scores 28 points, Moses Moody adds 24 as Warriors beat Suns 118-107

articles.headline: Bulls rally from 24 down vs. 76ers in battle of East leaders
articles.description: The Bulls stormed back from a 24-point deficit to beat the 76ers on a late go-ahead 3-pointer in a battle between the early leaders in the East.

images.alt: Bulls rally from 24 down vs. 76ers in battle of East leaders

articles.headline: Warriors' Jimmy Butler leaves vs. Suns with sore lower back
articles.description: Warriors forward Jimmy Butler, who was dealing with a sore lower back coming into Tuesday's game against the Suns, played just 14 first-half minutes and was ruled out in the third quarter.

images.alt: Warriors' Jimmy Butler leaves vs. Suns with sore lower back
